Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: First I need to understand the normative constraints thoroughly The strict sequence is Application Received Credit Check Risk Assessment Loan Decision Inform Applicant If Approved Finalize Documentation Close Case The ordering rules are that Credit Check must come before Risk Assessment which must come before Loan Decision Then Inform Applicant after Loan Decision If approved Finalize Documentation before Close Case if rejected close without finalizing

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Now looking at the event log for each case Case 1 The activities follow the correct sequence Application is received then Credit Check Risk Assessment Loan Decision Approved Inform Applicant Finalize Documentation Close Case All steps are in order and since it is approved Finalize is done before closing No issues here So Case 1 is compliant with normative rules

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Case 2 Application Received then immediately Risk Assessment That is a problem because Credit Check must happen before Risk Assessment So here Risk Assessment is done before Credit Check That violates the ordering rule Then after Risk Assessment Credit Check is done which is out of order Then Loan Decision Rejected which is okay But then Finalize Documentation is done after a rejection That is another violation because if rejected you should not finalize documentation So Case 2 has two normative violations incorrect order of Credit Check and Risk Assessment and finalizing documentation after rejection

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Case 3 Application is received then 24 hours later Credit Check is done The desideratum says Credit Check should be within 24 hours So if the application was on 20240112 0900 and Credit Check is on 20240114 1000 that is 42 hours later That is a desideratum violation Then Risk Assessment Loan Decision Approved then Inform Applicant is on 20240116 1500 The decision was made on 20240114 1200 so the inform is 2 days and 3 hours later The desideratum is to inform within 48 hours which is 2 days So that is also a desideratum violation Then Finalize and Close Case The sequence is correct here Also there is no Followup Call which is a desideratum but not a normative rule So Case 3 has three desideratum violations delayed Credit Check delayed Inform Applicant and missing Followup Call No normative violations

Name: Backtracking - IND
Text: So for the first task identifying normative violations Cases 2 and 3 Wait no Wait Case 3 has no normative violations Only Case 2 has normative violations

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Then for the desiderata Cases 3 and maybe some others Let me check again Case 1 All steps are done in time Credit Check is within 24 hours from 0900 to 0930 same day so 30 minutes Inform Applicant is done 2 hours after the decision which is within 48 hours Also there is no mention of a Followup Call but since it is not required that is okay So Case 1 meets desiderata

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Case 2 The Credit Check is done after Risk Assessment which is a normative violation The desiderata for Case 2 The Credit Check is done 40 minutes after Application from 0800 to 0820 is 20 minutes then Risk Assessment at 0820 then Credit Check at 0900 So the Credit Check is 1 hour after the application That is within 24 hours so no desideratum violation there The Inform Applicant is after Loan Decision The Loan Decision is at 0930 then Inform Applicant at 1000 That is 30 minutes later which is within 48 hours So the only desideratum issue here is that the Followup Call is missing But the desiderata mention that Followup Call is encouraged but not required So Case 2 does not have a desideratum violation in timing but maybe missing the follow up

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: So Case 2 and Case 3 have desideratum issues Case 2s desideratum violations missing follow up Case 3s delayed Credit Check delayed Inform missing follow up

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: So summarizing 1 Normative violations Only Case 2 ordering of Credit Check and Risk Assessment and Finalize after rejection 2 Desideratum violations Case 2 missing follow up and Case 3 delayed Credit Check delayed Inform missing follow up Case 1 has none Now for the third part suggesting interpretations or justifications For Case 2 the Credit Check was done after Risk Assessment Maybe there was a mistake in the process or the system allowed it The Finalize Documentation after rejection might be a data entry error For Case 3 the delays could be due to high workload or backlogs The missing follow up could be an oversight or a decision to prioritize closing the case quickly

Name: Validation - PE
Text: I need to make sure I did not miss any other violations Let me check again Case 2 The sequence is Application Risk Assessment incorrect Credit Check correct after Risk Assessment but out of order Loan Decision Rejected Finalize Documentation incorrect after rejection Close Case So two normative violations here The ordering of Credit Check and Risk Assessment and Finalize after rejection Case 3 All steps are in correct order Approved so Finalize before Close No normative issues But desiderata Credit Check done 42 hours after application application on 12th at 0900 Credit Check on 14th at 1000 From 14th 1200 to 16th 1500 is 2 days and 3 hours which is over 48 hours So that is another desideratum violation Also no follow up call So three desideratum issues
